headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid EMR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 14.3% since June 2025, Emerson Electric (currently trading at $136.12 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 8.4%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
